pages.text: To truly understand and utilize the power of the $(bold)Void$(), one must be able to have a greater knowledge of it. This is achieved by the $(bold)$(6)Ominous Book$(). This book is created by the power of the void and is used to write down notes on it further, as well as an even greater power later...
A book used to store various notes on the void and things relating to alchemy. A great power lies within...
